TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PageSettings extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 指定应用于单页打印的设置。

span.span: Specifies settings that apply to a single, printed page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于指定修改页面打印方式的设置。The class is used to specify settings that modify the way a page will be printed. 通常, 可以通过属性设置要打印的所有页的默认设置。Typically, you set default settings for all pages to be printed through the property. 若要逐页指定设置, 请分别处理或事件, 并修改 或中包含的参数。To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the or event and modify the argument included in the or , respectively. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅类概述。For more information about handling events, see the class overview. 有关打印的详细信息, 请参阅命名空间概述。For more information about printing, see the namespace overview. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何处理事件和检查的参数。The following example demonstrates handling the event and checking the argument of . 若要使用此代码, 请向 Windows `PrintDocument1`窗体添加一个名为的组件, 并`printDocument1_PrintPage`将其事件与示例中的方法相关联。To use this code, add a component named `PrintDocument1` to a Windows Form and associate its event with the `printDocument1_PrintPage` method in the example. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/VB/form1.vb#3)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无参数构造函数将所有字段初始化为其默认值。The parameterless constructor initializes all fields to their default values. 通常, 你不会创建的实例, 而是使用来设置所有页的设置。Typically, you do not create an instance of , but instead use the to set settings for all pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数类似于初始化的新实例并设置属性。 The constructor is similar to initializing a new instance of and setting the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否应以彩色打印该页。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page should be printed in color.

value.span: 如果该页应以彩色打印，则为 ；反之，则为 。

span.span: if the page should be printed in color; otherwise, .
The default is determined by the printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用属性来确定打印机是否支持彩色打印。You can use the property to determine if the printer supports color printing. 如果打印机支持颜色, 但您不希望以彩色打印, 请将属性设置为。 `false`If the printer supports color, but you do not want to print in color, set the property to `false`. 默认值为`true`。The default will be `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用颜色打印第一页, 如果打印机支持该文档。The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it. 该示例需要创建一个名为`printDoc`的变量, 并处理和事件。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the and events are handled. 在此示例中使用和命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法, 将相关信息从复制`DEVMODE`到结构。 Call the method to copy relevant information to a `DEVMODE` structure from a . 如果要进行需要的`DEVMODE`非托管 Win32 调用, 此方法非常有用。This method is useful when you want to make unmanaged Win32 calls that require a `DEVMODE`. 若要将信息从`DEVMODE`结构复制到, 请调用。To copy information from a `DEVMODE` structure to the , call .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是横向还是纵向打印该页。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page is printed in landscape or portrait orientation.

value.span: 如果页面应横向打印，则为 ；反之，则为 。

span.span: if the page should be printed in landscape orientation; otherwise, .
The default is determined by the printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用属性来确定纵向旋转以生成横向方向的角度 (以度为单位)。You can use the property to determine the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过属性将文档的默认页面方向设置为横向, 并打印文档。The following code example sets a document's default page orientation to landscape through the property, and prints the document. 该示例有三个先决条件:The example has three prerequisites: - 已将名`filePath`为的变量设置为要打印的文件的路径。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 已经定义了`pd_PrintPage`一个名为的方法, 该方法处理事件。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 已将名`printer`为的变量设置为打印机的名称。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 在此示例中使用 、和命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. summary.span: 获取或设置该页的边距。

span.span: Gets or sets the margins for this page.

value.span: ，表示页边距（以百分之一英寸为单位）。

span.span: A that represents the margins, in hundredths of an inch, for the page.

value.span: 默认情况下各边的边距都为 1 英寸。

span.span: The default is 1-inch margins on all sides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 处理事件时, 可以将此属性与属性一起使用来计算页面的打印区域。When handling the event, you can use this property along with the property to calculate the printing area for the page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将文档的默认页面设置设置为每一端的边距为1英寸。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to margins to 1 inch on each side. 该示例有三个先决条件:The example has three prerequisites: - 已将名`filePath`为的变量设置为要打印的文件的路径。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 已经定义了`pd_PrintPage`一个名为的方法, 该方法处理事件。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 已将名`printer`为的变量设置为打印机的名称。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 在此示例中使用 、和命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. summary.span: 获取或设置该页的纸张大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the paper size for the page.
A that represents the size of the paper.

value.span: 默认值为打印机的默认纸张大小。

span.span: The default is the printer's default paper size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示通过属性的纸张大小, 其中包含其中一个值。 A represents the size of the paper through the property, which contains one of the values. 将页面的 属性设置为有效的, 可通过集合进行访问。 Set the property for the page to a valid , available through the collection. 有关如何指定自定义纸张大小的信息, 请参阅构造函数。For information about how you can specify a custom paper size, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例为文档的默认页设置了三个属性, 包括基于`comboPaperSize`组合框中所选大小的纸张大小, 然后使用方法打印文档。The following code example sets three properties for the document's default page, including the paper size based upon the size selected in the `comboPaperSize` combo box, and then prints the document using the method. 该示例要求名为`printDoc`的变量存在并且存在特定的组合框。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo boxes exist. summary.span: 获取打印机的可打印页面区域的界限。

span.span: Gets the bounds of the printable area of the page for the printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无论页面方向是横向还是纵向,属性都将返回正确的值。The property returns the correct value, whether the page orientation is landscape or portrait. 您可以使用此属性在页面的边距之外打印, 但在可打印区域内打印。You can use this property to print outside the margins of the page, but within the printable area.
